entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:18 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
